content: शाण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [शणेन निर्वृत्तं अण्] Hempen, flaxen. --णः {@--1@} A touchstone; मणिः शाणो ल्लीढः <ls>Bh. 2. 44</ls>; <ls>Bv. 1. 73.</ls> {@--2@} A whetstone. {@--3@} A saw. {@--4@} A weight of four Māṣas. --णं {@--1@} Sack-cloth, coarse cloth. {@--2@} A hempen garment; <ls>Ms. 2. 41</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">10. 87.</ls>
